GK19suvasavu:2: paśyanti sūkṣmamatayaḥ sā jayati sarasvatī devī // SuVas_1 //
GK19suvasavu:3: khinno 'si muñca śailaṃ bibhṛmo vayam iti vadatsu śithilabhujaḥ /
GK19suvasavu:4: bharabhugnavitatabāhuṣu gopeṣu hasan harir jayati // SuVas_2 //
GK19suvasavu:6: rājanti valivibhaṅgāḥ sa pātu dāmodaro bhavataḥ // SuVas_3 //
GK19suvasavu:7: sa jayati himakaralekhā cakāsti yasyotsukomayā nihitā /
GK19suvasavu:11: viṣadharato 'py ativiṣamaḥ khala iti na mṛṣā vadanti vidvāṃsaḥ /
GK19suvasavu:12: yad ayaṃ nakuladveṣī sa kuladveṣī punaḥ piśunaḥ // SuVas_6 //
GK19suvasavu:13: atimaline kartavye bhavati khalānām atīva nipuṇā dhīḥ /
GK19suvasavu:14: timire hi kauśikānāṃ rūpaṃ pratipadyate dṛṣṭiḥ // SuVas_7 //
GK19suvasavu:15: hasta iva bhūtimalino laṅghayati yathā yathā khalaḥ sujanam /
GK19suvasavu:16: darpaṇam iva taṃ kurute tathā tathā nirmalacchāyam // SuVas_8 //
GK19suvasavu:18: antaritaśaśirucām api salilamucāṃ malinim ābhyadhikaḥ // SuVas_9 //
GK19suvasavu:19: sā rasavattā nihatā navakā vilasanti carati no kaṅkaḥ /
GK19suvasavu:20: sarasīva kīrtiśeṣaṃ gatavati bhuvi vikramāditye // SuVas_10 //
GK19suvasavu:22: anadhigataparimalāpi hi harati dṛśaṃ mālatīmālā // SuVas_11 //
GK19suvasavu:23: guṇinām api nijarūpapratipattiḥ parata eva saṃbhavati /
GK19suvasavu:24: svamahimadarśanam akṣṇor mukuratale jāyate yasmāt // SuVas_12 //
GK19suvasavu:50: yatra ca śāsati dharaṇimaṇḍalaṃ chalanigrahaprayogā vādeṣu,
GK19suvasavu:66: rāghavaḥ pariharann api janakabhuvaṃ janakabhuvā saha vanaṃ viveśa |
GK19suvasavu:67: bharato 'pi rāmadarśitabhaktir api rājye virāmam akarot |
GK19suvasavu:68: nalasya damayantyā militasyāpi punar bhūparigraho jātaḥ |
GK19suvasavu:73: sarvataḥ kaṭakasaṃcāriṇo gandharvān darśitaśṛṅgonnatiḥ sukhayan na virarāma |
GK19suvasavu:74: sa himālayo nāvaśyāyocchalitaḥ no māyājanmane hitaś ca |
GK19suvasavu:75: asau hi mānī giri sthito vṛṣadhvajaś ca |
GK19suvasavu:76: [asau] sadgatiḥ, avadhūtākhilakāntāraḥ, pāvakāgresaraḥ, na bhogotsukaḥ sumanoharaḥ[ś ca] |
GK19suvasavu:86: [sa candra iva] kṣaṇadānandakaraḥ, kumudavanabandhuḥ, sakalakalākulagṛhaṃ, natārātibalaḥ |
GK19suvasavu:87: [sa samudro] mitrodayahetuḥ, kāñcana śobhāṃ bibhrat, acalādhikalakṣmīḥ sumerur iva |
GK19suvasavu:88: yasya ca ripuvargaḥ sadā pārtho 'pi na mahābhārataraṇayogyaḥ,
GK19suvasavu:91: api ca sa triśaṅkur iva nakṣatrapathasthalitaḥ,
GK19suvasavu:133: prasannasattvāḥ santaḥ parām ṛddhim avāpuḥ prajālokāḥ |
GK19suvasavu:137: makaraketor iva darśanena vanitājanasya hṛdayam ullalāsa |
GK19suvasavu:160: yasya ca pratāpānaladagdhānāṃ ripusundarīṇāṃ karatalatāḍanabhītair iva muktāhāraiḥ payodharaparisaro muktaḥ |
GK19suvasavu:169: atha sa kadācid avasannāyāṃ yāmavatyāṃ dadhidhavale kālakṣapaṇakapiṇḍa iva niśāyamunāphenastabake,
GK19suvasavu:180: sakalanipītaniśātimirasaṃghātam atitanīyastayā soḍhum asamartheṣv iva kajjalavyājād udvamatsu,
GK19suvasavu:192: vigalitakundair alakaiḥ priyavirahaśokād bāṣpabindūn utsṛjadbhir iva priyatamagamananiṣedham iva kurvatīṣu vācālatulākoṭibhiś caraṇapallavair vilasitāsu,
GK19suvasavu:205: priyavirahitāsu rahitāsu sukhena murmuram iva varṣati samantād arpake darpakeṣu dahanasya,
GK19suvasavu:215: payodharakalaśayoḥ kathaṃ mayy eva pāto bhaviṣyatīti cintayeva,
GK19suvasavu:217: vidhātur atipīḍayato hastaparāmarśajanitaparikleśeneva kṣīṇataratām upagatena madhyabhāgenālaṅkṛtām,
GK19suvasavu:219: atigurupariṇāhatayā patanabhayakhillitābhyām iva cūcukacchalena vidhinā iva kīlitābhyāṃ,
GK19suvasavu:234: taruṇaketakadaladrāghīyasā pakṣmalacaṭulālasena hṛdayāvāsagṛhāvasthitasya hṛcchayavilāsino gavākṣaśaṅkām upajanayatā,
GK19suvasavu:255: śanaiś careṇa pādena saumyena darśanena guruṇā nitambena,
GK19suvasavu:257: grahamayīm iva saṃsārabhitticitralekhām iva trailokyasaundaryasaṅketabhūmim iva rasāñjanasiddhim iva yauvanasya,
GK19suvasavu:270: tribhuvanavilocanamṛṣṭim iva prajāpateḥ kanyakām aṣṭādaśavarṣadeśīyām apaśyat svapne |
GK19suvasavu:271: 6) atha tāṃ prītivistāritena pibann iva cakṣuṣā, janiterṣyayeva nidrayā cirasevitayā mumuce |
GK19suvasavu:272: vibuddhas tu viṣasarasīva durjanavacasīva nimagnam ātmānam avadhārayituṃ na śaśāka |
GK19suvasavu:273: tathā hi kṣaṇam ākāśatalāliṅganārthaṃ prasāritabāhuyugalaḥ “ehy ehi priyatame,
GK19suvasavu:274: mā gaccha mā gaccheti” dikṣu vidikṣu ca vilikhitām ivotkīrṇām iva cakṣuṣi nikhātām iva hṛdaye priyām ājuhāva |
GK19suvasavu:275: tatas tatraiva śayyātale nilīno niṣiddhāśeṣaparijanadarśano dattakapāṭaḥ parihṛtatāmbūlāhārādisakalopabhogas taṃ divasam anayat |
GK19suvasavu:278: atha tasya priyasakho Makarando nāma katham api labdhapraveśaḥ kandarpasāyakaprahāravivaśaṃ Kandarpaketum uvāca |
GK19suvasavu:281: khalā(ḥ) punas tat tad aniṣṭam anucitam evāvadhārayanti |
GK19suvasavu:287: sarṣapasneha iva karayugalālito 'pi śirasā dhṛto 'pi na kāṭavaṃ jahāti |
GK19suvasavu:290: viṣataruprasava iva yathā yathānubhūyate tathā tathā moham eva draḍhayati |
GK19suvasavu:292: nidāghadivasa iva matsaro vahati saṃtāpaṃ sumanasām |
GK19suvasavu:294: virūpākṣo 'pi cakradharaḥ, śakraś ca ivoccaiḥśravāḥ nadeśajapraśaṃsī ca |
GK19suvasavu:299: vṛṣabha iva surabhiyānavikalaḥ kāmīva gotraskhalanavidhuro vāmādhvānuraktaś ca |
GK19suvasavu:300: ajīrṇavikāra iva kalevare 'pi vacasi mandimānam āvahati |
GK19suvasavu:301: vañcaka iva raktaḥ kaṭukaphalena vibhāvarīraktaś ca |
GK19suvasavu:304: kuddāla iva dalitagotraḥ kṣamābhājaḥ prāṇino nikṛntati |
GK19suvasavu:306: duṣṭaśūrpaśrutir iva kānanarucir anugatam api yavasaṃ tataṃ nānumodate |
GK19suvasavu:307: abījād eva jāyante 'kāṇḍāt prasaranti khalavyasanāṅkurāḥ durucchedāś ca bhavanti |
GK19suvasavu:308: asatāṃ hṛdi praviṣṭo hi doṣalavaḥ karālāyate,
GK19suvasavu:310: bhūyo yadi katham api viśati tadā pārada iva kṣaṇamātraṃ na tiṣṭhati |
GK19suvasavu:312: sukhaṃ janā hi bhavādṛśāḥ śaratsamayā iva haranti na ca mitrasya sacetanā visadṛśam upadiśanti
GK19suvasavu:314_0: [tathā hi] mādhuryaśaityaśucitvatāpaśāntibhiḥ payaḥ paya iti nimittatām upagatasya
GK19suvasavu:314_1: dugdhasya matsamāgamād vardhitasya kvāthe puro mamaiva kṣayo yukta iti vicintyeva vāriṇāpi kṣīyate |
GK19suvasavu:317: sādhavo hi mohāt param utpathapravṛttā bhavantītyādi” vadati tasmin katham api smaraprahāraparavaśaḥ parimitākṣaram uvāca [Kandarpaketuḥ] |
GK19suvasavu:325: tad adhunā yadi tvaṃ sahapāṃsukṛīḍitasamaduḥkhasukho 'si tadā mām anugacchety” uktvā parijanālakṣitas tena sahaiva purān nirjagāma |
GK19suvasavu:358: pihitāmbaro 'py ullasadaṃśuko Vindhyo nāma mahāgirir adṛśyata |
GK19suvasavu:368: sukumāralalitābhiḥ puṣpitāgrābhiḥ śikhariṇībhiḥ praharṣiṇībhir latābhir darśitānekavṛttavilāsaḥ |
GK19suvasavu:388: dhanakāmayeva kṛtabhūbhṛtsevayā revayā priyatamayeva prasāritavīcihastopagūḍhaḥ | yaś ca
GK19suvasavu:393: daṃṣṭrākoṭivisaṅkaṭāsyakuharaḥ kurvan saṭām utkaṭām utkarṇaḥ kurute kramaṃ karipatau krūrākṛtiḥ kesarī // SuVas_15 //
GK19suvasavu:396: citreṇāpi na śakyate vilikhituṃ sarvāṅgasaṅkocabhāk cītkurvadgirikuñjakuñjaraśiraḥ kumbhasthalastho hariḥ // SuVas_16 //
GK19suvasavu:414: atrāntare bhagavān api marīcimālī ātapaklāntamattamahiṣalocanapāṭalamaṇḍalaś caramācalaśṛṅgam āruroha |
GK19suvasavu:415: 12) tato Makarandaḥ phalamūlāny ādāya katham api tam abhininditāhāraparicayam akārṣīt |
GK19suvasavu:417: atha tām eva priyatamāṃ ḥṛdayaphalake saṃkalpatūlikayā likhitām avalokayan niṣyandakaraṇagrāmaḥ Kandarpaketur Makarandaviracitapallavaśayane suṣvāpa |
GK19suvasavu:418: athārdhayāmamātrakhaṇḍitāyāṃ vibhāvaryāṃ tatra jambūtaruśikhare mithaḥ kalahāyamānayoḥ śukaśārikayoḥ kalakalaṃ śrutvā,
GK19suvasavu:422: “kitava śārikāntaram anviṣya samāgato 'si, katham itarathā rātrir iyatī taveti” |
GK19suvasavu:459: andhāsureṇeva śūlānām uparigatena veśyājanenādhiṣṭhitaṃ Kusumapuraṃ nāma nagaram |
GK19suvasavu:480: [yac ca] diśi diśi kusumanikaram iva tārāgaṇam udvahadbhiḥ,
GK19suvasavu:502: kṛṣṇa iva satyabhāmopetaḥ Śṛṅgāraśekharo nāma rājā prativasati |
GK19suvasavu:503: yo balabhit pāvako dharmarāṇ nirṛtiḥ pracetāḥ sadāgatir dhanadaḥ śaṅkara ity aṣṭamūrtir apy anaṣṭamūrtiḥ |
GK19suvasavu:504: surāṇāṃ pātāsau sa punar atipuṇyaikahṛdayo grahas tasyāsthāne gururucitamārge sa nirataḥ /
GK19suvasavu:505: karas tasyātyarthaṃ vahati śatakoṭipraṇayitāṃ sa sarvasvaṃ dātā tṛṇam iva sureśaṃ vijayate // SuVas_17 //
GK19suvasavu:506: jīvākṛṣṭiṃ sa cakre mṛdhabhuvi dhanuṣaḥ śatrur āsīd gatāsur lakṣāptir mārgaṇānām abhavad aribale tad yaśas tena labdham /
GK19suvasavu:507: muktā tena kṣameti tvaritam arigaṇair uttamāṅgaiḥ pratīṣṭo pañcatvaṃ dveṣisainye sthitam avanipatir nāpa saṅkhyāntaraṃ saḥ // SuVas_18 //
GK19suvasavu:509: yatra ca rājanīticature caturambudhimekhalāyā bhuvo nāyake śāsati vasumatīṃ pitṛkārye vṛṣotsargaḥ,
GK19suvasavu:543: tayoś ca madhyamopāntavayasi vartamānayoḥ katham api daiva(va)
GK19suvasavu:546: atha sā rāvaṇabhujavana ivollāsitagotreva pariṇāmam upayāty api yauvanabhāve pariṇayaparaṅmukhī tasthau |
GK19suvasavu:568: 20) atidūrapravṛddhena madhunā jagati ko vā na vikriyate yad atimukto 'pi munir api vicakāsa |
GK19suvasavu:570: vṛntanirgatavicakilavivare guñjanmadhukaro makaraketos tribhuvanavijayaśaṅkhadhvanim iva cakāra |
GK19suvasavu:571: navayāvakapaṅkapallavitasanūpurataruṇīcaraṇaprahārānurāgavaśān navakisalayacchalena tam eva rāgam udavahad aśokapādapaḥ |
GK19suvasavu:572: madhuramadhudhvanitakāminīmukhakamalasaṅgānurāgād iva tadrasam ātmakusumeṣu bibhrad bakulatarū rarājata |
GK19suvasavu:575: virahiṇīhṛdayamathanāya kusumaśarasya cakram iva nāgakesarakusumam aśobhata |
GK19suvasavu:576: pathikahṛdayam astyaṃ grahītuṃ makaraketoḥ palāva iva pāṭalipuṣpam adaśyata |
GK19suvasavu:585: atrāntare Vāsavadattāsakhījanād viditābhiprāyaḥ Śṛṅgāraśekharaḥ svasutāsvayaṃvarārtham aśeṣadharaṇitalabhājāṃ bhūbhujāṃ saṅgatam akarot |
GK19suvasavu:590: arjunasamaram iva nandighoṣamukharitadigantaṃ mañcam āruroha Vāsavadattā |
GK19suvasavu:595: itare py āhartum udyatā iva svabalārthinaḥ,
GK19suvasavu:611: kecit kumudākarā ivāsoḍhabhāsaḥ kṣaṇam evaṃ sthitā rājaputrāḥ |
GK19suvasavu:612: sā ca kṣaṇenaikaikaśaḥ samavalokya kumārikā ta(s)māt karṇīrathād avatatāra |
GK19suvasavu:614: atha sā tasyām eva rātrau svapne vālinam ivāṅgadopaśobhitaṃ,
GK19suvasavu:618: kṛṣṇam iva kaṃ saharṣaṃ na kurvantaṃ,
GK19suvasavu:625: godayā bhujayā svarvāhinyā kīrtyā ca puṇyamayam iva,
GK19suvasavu:635: kośam iva mahāsaundaryasya tribhuvanalobhanīyākṛtiṃ yuvānaṃ dadarśa |
GK19suvasavu:636: 25) “sa Cintāmaṇināmno rājñas tanayaḥ Kandarpaketur nāmeti” sā svapna eva nāmādikam aśrauṣīt |
GK19suvasavu:638: manye svasyaiva naipuṇyasya saundaryadarśanotsukamanasā kamalabhuvā jagattrayasamavāye rūpaparamāṇūn ādādya viracito 'yam anyathā katham ayam asya kāntiviśeṣa” iti,
GK19suvasavu:641: aphalam iva duṣyantasya kṛte śakuntalāpi durvāsasaḥ śāpam anubabhūva,
GK19suvasavu:644: viphalam eva dhūmorṇā svayaṃvarārthagatadevagrahagandharvasahasreṣu dharmarājam akāṅkṣateti” bahudhiyā cintayantī virahamurmuramadhyam ārūḍheva vāḍavāgniśikhā[kavaliteva],
GK19suvasavu:670: malayānilāhatajīviteva “priyasakhy Anaṅgalekhe vitara[me] hṛdaye pāṇipādaṃ duḥsaho virahasantāpaḥ,
GK19suvasavu:675: capale Citralekhe likha citre cittacoraṃ janaṃ,
GK19suvasavu:678: sukānte Kāntimati mandaṃ mandam apanaya bāṣpabindūn, yū(thi)
GK19suvasavu:683: kim iti locanamayāni mamāṅgāni vidhinā na kṛtāni,
GK19suvasavu:686: [malayānila] suratotkaṇṭhadīkṣāguro vaha yatheccham” iti bahuvidhaṃ bhāṣamāṇā Vāsavadattā sakhījanena samaṃ mumūrccha |
GK19suvasavu:705: puṇyanāmākṣarāṇi ca tāni sukṛtabhāñji yāny amunā pariṣkṛtānīti muhur muhuḥ paribhāvayantī,
GK19suvasavu:710: puro darśitam ivetas tato vilokayantī vyatiṣṭhata |
GK19suvasavu:712: atha tasyāḥ sārikā Tamālikā nāma tatsakhībhiḥ sahālocya Kandarpaketor bhāvam ākalayituṃ [pra]sthitā |
GK19suvasavu:713: āgatā ca mayaiva sārdham atraiva taror adhas tiṣṭhatīty” uktvā virarāma |
GK19suvasavu:714: 28) atha saharṣam utthāya Makarando viditavṛttāntāṃ Tamālikām akarot |
GK19suvasavu:715: sā ca kṛtapraṇāmā Kandarpaketave patrikām upānayata |
GK19suvasavu:718: svapnānubhūtabhāvā draḍhayati na pratyayaṃ yuvatiḥ // SuVas_19 //
GK19suvasavu:720: tac chrutvā Kandarpaketur amṛtārṇavamagnam iva sarvānandānām upari vartamāno mandaṃ mandam utthāya prasāritabāhuyugalas tām āliliṅga |
GK19suvasavu:723: katham āsta” ityādi sakalaṃ vṛttāntaṃ pṛcchaṃs tāṃ niśāṃ dinam apy ativāhya cacāla Kandarpaketuḥ |
GK19suvasavu:724: atrāntare bhagavān api marīcimālī enaṃ vṛttāntam iva kathayituṃ madhyamaṃ lokam avātarat |
GK19suvasavu:737: durvidha iva parityaktavasuḥ saviṣādaś ca, śā(kya)
GK19suvasavu:753: mukharitadhanuṣi varṣati śaranikaram anavaratam aśeṣasaṃsāraśemuṣīmuṣi makaradhvaje,
GK19suvasavu:762: athānena pravartatā [vartmanā] bhagavatā bhānunā [ā]gantavyam iti sarvapaṭṭamayair vasanair iva maṇikuṭṭimābhir viracitavaruṇena,
GK19suvasavu:773: kṣaṇena ca kṣaṇadārāgaracanācaturāsu sandhyāśiṣyāsv iva veśyāsu tulādhāraśūnyāyāṃ paṇyavīthyām iva divi,
GK19suvasavu:798: bauddhasiddhāntam iva pratyakṣadravyam apahnuvānaṃ timiram ajṛmbhata |
GK19suvasavu:809: tato niśākarārambhasamaya iva saṃkucatkuvalayavyājaviracitāñjalipuṭe namati tamitimire,
GK19suvasavu:814: viśvaṃ gaṇayatovidhātuḥ śaśikamaṭhinīkhaṇḍena tamomaṣīśyāme 'jina iva viyati saṃsārasyātiśūnyatvāc chūnyabindava iva vitatāḥ,
GK19suvasavu:828: ravivirahavidhurāyāḥ kamalinyā hṛdayam iva dvidhā papāṭa cakravākamithunam |
GK19suvasavu:829: āgamiṣyato himakaradayitasya pārśve saṃcarantī kumudinyā bhramaramālā dūtīvālakṣyata |
GK19suvasavu:830: tārakāvyājād astaṅgatasya divākarasya śokād iva kakubho vyarudan |
GK19suvasavu:831: bhāsvato nijadayitasya virahād abhinavakiñjalkarāśivyājena murmura iva nalinīkośahṛdaye jajvāla |
GK19suvasavu:847: acchakuṅkumapiṇḍapūrṇasthita[pātra] iva niśāvilāsinyāḥ kuṅkumāruṇaśveta[stana]kalaśa iva cākhaṇḍalāśāyāḥ,
GK19suvasavu:850: tataḥ kāminīhṛdayasaṅkrāmita iva cakorāṅganānetrapuṭapāṭita iva raktakumudakośakīṭa iva kṣīṇatāṃ jagāma kṣaṇadākṛto rāgaḥ |
GK19suvasavu:878: atrāntare 'bhisārikāsārthapreṣitānāṃ priyatamān prati dūtīnāṃ dvyarthāḥ saprapañcāḥ vikārabhaṅgurāḥ pravādā babhūvuḥ |
GK19suvasavu:882: na cākarṣakacumbakadrāvakeṣv eko 'py asi, bhrāmako 'si paraṃ kitava |
GK19suvasavu:883: dhamārthāny aprayuktaḥ kṣepaṇika iva mudhā vāhitataravāris tvam asi |
GK19suvasavu:886: sa khalu vīraḥ pratipakṣasya yaḥ samprahārataḥ kuñjarān nayati |
GK19suvasavu:887: dhṛtorukaravālasañcayo 'pi paramakāṇḍa eva etan mahāpadaṃ vigraheṇa labhate |
GK19suvasavu:888: rājasena rahito rājase na rahito dhruvam |
GK19suvasavu:889: viśāradā viśāradābhraviśadā viśadātmanīnamahimānam ahimānarakṣaṇakṣamā kṣamātilaka te vīratā vīratā manasi bhūtatā bhūtatā vacasi |
GK19suvasavu:890: sāhasena sā hasena kamalā kamalālayā jitā,
GK19suvasavu:891: sā tvadarpaṇā darpaṇākāravimalāśayā śayābjanirjitakisalayā salayāṅgulir iva vibhrameṇa vibhrameṇa gavākṣaśalākāvivaraṃ prati vilokayantī vilokayantī vināśāpam anubhavati duḥkhāni |
GK19suvasavu:892: jīvanāyaka jīvanāya ka iha nāśrayati subhagam |
GK19suvasavu:893: anyās tāvad āsatāṃ dāsatāṃ purato 'ham eva bhajāmi, maitry ato maitryato 'stu |
GK19suvasavu:894: añjasārataḥ sārataḥ kim api kandarpakaṃ darpakaṃ na tanoṣi viśeṣato 'śeṣataḥ sthitam eva maraṇam |
GK19suvasavu:895: śaṭḥadhiyāṃ śodhana yaśodhana premahāryāmahāryā samotkaṭākṣaiḥ kaṭākṣair āvirbhūtadāsyās tadāsyāḥ parijanāḥ |
GK19suvasavu:897: viśvasya viśvasya vyavasthāṃ samāsādya samāsād yam anekakālaṃ saṅgītasaṅgī tanuṣe 'tanuṣekam anaṅgapuṣpeṣu puṣpeṣurujā tarasā jātarasā mandākṣamandā kṣaṇaṃ bhramantī muhyati |
GK19suvasavu:898_0: kāmadhurādhareṇa kā madhurādhareṇa yuktā rajorājiviśeṣakeṇa saviśeṣakeṇa mukhendunā
GK19suvasavu:898_1: tava hṛdi lagnā mradimākareṇa kareṇa svedabindupayodhareṇa payodhareṇa vakṣaḥphalakāñcanena
GK19suvasavu:899: kāmadāruṇa madāruṇanetrā smaramayaṃ ramayantaṃ tvām adayaṃ madayantī paramakamitāraṃ vāñchati hāriṇā
GK19suvasavu:902: sphaṭikagṛhapraviṣṭam iva śvetadvīpanivāsasukham anubhavad iva jagad āmumude |
GK19suvasavu:906_1: niśāniḥśvāsanibhe nabhasvati Kandarpaketus TamālikāMakarandasahāyo Vāsavadattājanakanagarīm ayāsīt |
GK19suvasavu:908: anantaraṃ kaṭakaikadeśaviracitaikāntanihitamuktāmakarandapadmarāgaśakalena Vāsavadattādarśanārtham āsthitena devatāgaṇeneva jātavalayena parigatam,
GK19suvasavu:909: anilollāsitābhir nabhastarumañjarībhir iva tarjayantībhir iva gaganapuraśriyaṃ patākābhir upaśobhamānaṃ,
GK19suvasavu:918: kācakalaśākṛtim udvahantībhiḥ śikhisaṃhatibhir udbhāsitaiḥ prāsādair upaśobhitaṃ,
GK19suvasavu:929: 41) “dravasi dravasindhuto nigalite capalā capalāyate kim eṣā |
GK19suvasavu:934: Kalike kaliketum imāṃ mukharāṃ muñca mekhalāṃ śṛṇuvaḥ kalavallakīvirutam |
GK19suvasavu:935: mekhalā me khalā na bhavati, tvam eva tv ameva mukharatayā mukharatayā ca |
GK19suvasavu:936: trapate 'tra pated iyam avantisenākusumopahāre mugdhā tava kaitavakairalaṃ,
GK19suvasavu:938: vahatīva hatīr Anaṅgalekhe smarasāyakānāṃ tava vapur alasam |
GK19suvasavu:941: vadane vada netrapeyakāntau kim upamānam indur apy upayāti |
GK19suvasavu:944: Kerali karakākarakālameghakhaṇḍatulām ayam ullasitotphullamallikāmālabhārī [tava yāti] kuntalakalāpaḥ |
GK19suvasavu:948: Murale stanatā stanatāḍaneṣu yat saukhyaṃ labdhaṃ smaratā smaratāpanodanaṃ tad iyaṃ tena viyuktā kiṃ muhyasi |
GK19suvasavu:949: hatamohatamo dayitaḥ smarati sma ratipriyaṃ tava kauśalaṃ |
GK19suvasavu:950: nakharāṇāṃ vraṇaḥ smarajanyāṃ sma rajanyāṃ kurute rujaṃ na te |
GK19suvasavu:951: kiṃ locanābhyāṃ locanābhyāṃ prīṇitākhila janekṣaṇadeśaḥ kṣaṇadeśaḥ kiṃ na pīyate |
GK19suvasavu:952: priyasakhi madanamālini mālini bimbādharasaṅgatyāgecchayā virāmaṃ kuru |
GK19suvasavu:972_0: Pravālike secaya ghusṛṇarasena bālapravālakānanam” ity anyonyapraṇayapeśalāḥ pramadānām
GK19suvasavu:972_1: ālāpakathāḥ śṛṇvan Kandarpaketur Makarandena samaṃ vismayam akaron manasi “aho bhavanānām
GK19suvasavu:975: asāv api karpūraśalākānirmitayantrapañjarasaṃyataḥ krīḍāśuka” ityādi paricintayan praviśya vyākaraṇeneva saraktapādena, bhāraten(ev)
GK19suvasavu:992: 42) atha prītivisphāritena cakṣuṣā pibataḥ Kandarpaketor jahāra cetanāṃ mūrcchāvegaḥ |
GK19suvasavu:995: tato Vāsavadattāyāḥ prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasī sarvavisrambhapātraṃ Kalāvatī nāma Kandarpaketum uvāca |
GK19suvasavu:998_0: tvatkṛte yānayā vedanānubhūtā sā yadi nabhaḥ patrāyate sāgaro lolāyate brahmā lipikarāyate
GK19suvasavu:998_1: bhujagapatir vākkathakaḥ tadā kim api katham apy ekaikair yugasahasrair abhilikhyate kathyate vā |
GK19suvasavu:1001: eṣāsmatsvāmiduhitā prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ pitrā yauvanātikramadoṣaśaṅkinā bhayena vidyādharacakravartino Vijayaketoḥ putrāya Puṣpaketave pāṇigrahaṇāya dātavyā |
GK19suvasavu:1002: anayāpy ālocitam adya yadi taṃ janam ādāya nāgacchati Tamālikā,
GK19suvasavu:1003: tadāvaśyam eva mayā hutavahe śayitavyam” iti |
GK19suvasavu:1004: tad asyāḥ sukṛtavaśena mahābhāgaḥ imāṃ bhūmim anuprāptaḥ |
GK19suvasavu:1005: atha Kandarpaketur bhītabhītaḥ sapraṇayam ānandāmṛtasāgaroddāmataraṅgalaharībhir āpluta iva Vāsavadattāyā sahāmantrya Makarandaṃ vārtānveṣaṇāya tatraiva nagare niyujya,
GK19suvasavu:1006: bhujageneva sadāgatyabhimukhena Manojavanāmnā turagena tayā saha nagarān niragāt |
GK19suvasavu:1031: kvacid vidhavām iva sindūratilakabhūṣitāṃ pravālābharaṇāṃ ca,
GK19suvasavu:1038: atrāntare bhagavaty api niśā tayor nidrām ādāya jagāma |
GK19suvasavu:1040: krameṇa kālakaivartakena tamisrānāyaṃ prakṣipya gaganamahāsarasi sajīvaśapharanikara ivāpahriyamāṇe tārāgaṇe,
GK19suvasavu:1041: raktāṃśuke viṣamaprarūḍhabisalatāśarayantrānugataśatapatrapustakasanāthe makarandabindusandohanirbharapānamattamadhukaramandramuktasvanaiḥ sadvarṇam iva paṭhati vikace kamalākare,
GK19suvasavu:1042: bhikṣukṛṣīvaleneva kālena timirabījeṣv iva madhukareṣu madhurasakardamitakesarapaṅkeṣu ghanaghaṭamānadalapuṭeṣu,
GK19suvasavu:1043: rajomurmurasanāthamadhukarapaṭalānugatoddaṇḍapuṇḍarīkavyājād dhūpam iva bhagavate kiraṇamāline prayacchantyāṃ kamalinyāṃ,
GK19suvasavu:1047: śākhābhya iva kampitābhyo digbhyo vikacaprasūna iva tārāgaṇe indumaṇḍalaphale ca patati,
GK19suvasavu:1048: tārātaṇḍulaśabalaṃ nabho 'ṅgaṇaṃ sphuradaruṇataruṇacūḍācāruvadane vāsarakṛkavākau caritum avatarati,
GK19suvasavu:1049: “matsaṅgatiprasiddho vāruṇīsamāgamād dvijapatir eṣa patiṣyatīti” hasantyām ivākhaṇḍalakakubhi,
GK19suvasavu:1063: dhāturāgāruṇadiggajapādatalānukāriṇi vibhāvarītimirataskare bhagavati bhāskare samudayam ārohati,
GK19suvasavu:1076: uttiṣṭhamānam uṣnam uṣṇaraśmer āśrayati raśmisañcaye Kandarpaketuḥ sarvarātrajāgaraparavaśa āhāraśūnyaśarīratayā niścetanaḥ,
GK19suvasavu:1080_0: tato vaṇijīva prasāritāmbare mahādāvānala iva sakalakāṣṭhādīpini pataṅgamaṇḍale madhyaṃdinam
GK19suvasavu:1080_1: āruḍhe Kandarpaketuḥ priyayā vinā latāgṛham avalokyotthāya tata ito dattadṛṣṭiḥ kṣaṇaṃ viṭapeṣu,
GK19suvasavu:1089: tvatkṛte mayā yāni duḥkhāny anubhūtāni, teṣāṃ tvam eva pramāṇam |
GK19suvasavu:1091: kiṃ mayā na kṛtam avadātaṃ karma |
GK19suvasavu:1104: kiṃ na kṛtaḥ śaraṇecchurabhaya” iti bahuvidhaṃ vilapan dakṣiṇena kānanaṃ nirgatya navyanalanaladanalinīniculapiculaviḍudabahulena,
GK19suvasavu:1135: vāruṇīvijayapatākābhir iva śeṣakulanirmokamañjarībhir iva śaśāṅkapariśeṣaparamāṇusantatibhir iva phenarājibhir upāntarāmaṇīyakaṃ,
GK19suvasavu:1136: aparam iva gaganaṃ avanītalam avatīrṇam acchārṇavacchalād ucchalacchīkarakaṇanikaranibhena nabhaścarān muktāphalair iva vilobhayantam,
GK19suvasavu:1169: acintayac ca “aho me kṛtāpakāreṇāpi vidhinopakṛtir eva kṛtā yad ayaṃ locanagocaratāṃ nītaḥ samudraḥ |
GK19suvasavu:1170: tad atra deham utsṛjya priyāvirahāgniṃ nirvāpayāmi |
GK19suvasavu:1171: yady apy anāturasyātmatyāgo na vihitas tathāpi kāryaḥ |
GK19suvasavu:1172: na khalu sarvaḥ sarvaṃ kāryam akāryaṃ vā karoti |
GK19suvasavu:1173: asāre saṃsāre kena kiṃ nāma na kṛtam |
GK19suvasavu:1206: 47) tataḥ kṛtasnānādir jalam avataritum ārebhe śarīratyāgāya |
GK19suvasavu:1216: “ārya Kandarpaketo punar api tava priyayā saṃgamo bhaviṣyatīty acireṇa |
GK19suvasavu:1219: punaḥ priyayā samāgamāśayā saṃsthitihetubhūtam aśanaṃ cikīrṣuḥ kacchopāntabhuvaṃ jagāma |
GK19suvasavu:1220: tatra tata itaḥ paribhraman phalamūlādinā vane vartayan kālaṃ nināya |
GK19suvasavu:1222: ekadā tu katipayamāsāpagame kākalīgāyana iva samṛddhanimnagānadaḥ,
GK19suvasavu:1234: pravasatānidāghena divaḥpayodhare smaraṇāya kṣatā nakhapadāvalir iva,
GK19suvasavu:1239: 51) ativeganipītajaladhiśaṅkhamālām iva balākācchalād udvamann ivādṛśyata jaladharanikaraḥ |
GK19suvasavu:1240: āpītaharitaiḥ kṛṣṇāsu kedārikākoṣṭhikāsu samutphaladbhir jātuśabalair iva dardurair vidyutā samaṃ cikrīḍa varṣākālaḥ |
GK19suvasavu:1241: ravidīpakajjalanicayanikaṣopala iva meghe samayasuvarṇakāranikaṣitasuvarṇalekheva taḍid aśobhata |
GK19suvasavu:1242: virahiṇāṃ hṛdayaṃ vidārayituṃ karapatram iva kusumāyudhasya krakacacchadam aśobhata |
GK19suvasavu:1243: jaladadāruṇi lolataḍillatāpatranipātavidārite vegadhūtāś cūrṇacayā iva jalareṇavo babhuḥ |
GK19suvasavu:1244: vicchinnadigvadhūhāramukta iva kharapavanavegabhramitaghanagharaghaṭṭanasañcūrṇitās tārānikarā iva bhuvanavijigīṣor makaradhvajasya prasthānalājāñjalaya iva karakā vyarājanta |
GK19suvasavu:1279: vikasvarasare śaratsamayārambhe Kandarpaketuḥ paribhraman śilāmayīṃ putrikāṃ kautukena,
GK19suvasavu:1283: 53) anantaraṃ spṛṣṭamātrā sā śilāmayīṃ mūrtim utsṛjya, punar Vāsavadattā svarūpam āpede |
GK19suvasavu:1284: tām avalokya Kandarpaketur amṛtārṇavamagna iva suciram āliṅgya papraccha |
GK19suvasavu:1286: 54) sā tu dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca niḥśvasya kathayitum ārebhe |
GK19suvasavu:1287: “āryaputrāpuṇyāyā mama mandabhāginyāḥ “kṛte mahābhāga ujjhitarājya” iti ekākī jana iva vāṅmanasayor agocaraṃ duḥkham anubhūtavān |
GK19suvasavu:1288: anekadivasān āhāraśūnyatayā kṛśataro nidrānte yadi kadācit phalamūlādikaṃ milati,
GK19suvasavu:1289: tadā śarīrasthitiṃ karotīti vicintya phalānveṣaṇāyopavanatarūn avalokayantī katipayanalvagocaram agaccham |
GK19suvasavu:1301: “kim ayaṃ mamānveṣaṇāya tātasya vyūha āhosvid āryaputrasya vāhinīsambhāra” iti cintayantyāṃ mayi paricārakakathitodanto mām uddiśya senāpatir dhāvitaḥ |
GK19suvasavu:1302: tato 'nantaraṃ kirātasainyasenāpatis tādṛśa eva senāsamanvito mṛgayāvyājenāgataḥ so 'pi dāvitaḥ |
GK19suvasavu:1304: “yady aham āryaputrāya kathayāmi tadaikāky ebhir avaśyam eva hantavyaḥ |
GK19suvasavu:1305: atha na kathayāmi tadāham evaibhir hantavyeti” cintākṣaṇa eva dvayoḥ sainyayor yuddham abhūd ekāmiṣābhiyuktayor gṛdhrayor iva |
GK19suvasavu:1314: sṛgālīprārthanīyeṣv āmiṣapiṇḍeṣv iva vatsadantakṣateṣu tṛṇeṣv iva,
GK19suvasavu:1315: jihmagadaṣṭeṣv iva śarīreṣv anāsthāṃ kalayantaḥ samaṃ dviṣāṃ dhanuṣāṃ ca jīvākarṣaṇaṃ cakruḥ |
GK19suvasavu:1317: tyāgina iva dānavanto mārgaṇasantāpam asahantaḥ mahāmṛgā utkupitā iva kṣamāṃ muñcantas turagā rejuḥ |
GK19suvasavu:1320: mūrdhnā cāsthāne praṇamatā “tyakto 'ham” iti harṣād eva nanarta ciraṃ kabandhaḥ |
GK19suvasavu:1322: tataḥ parihāseneva cakṣuṣī pidadhatā parāpavādaśravaṇāruṇeva śrotravṛttiṃ sthagayatā,
GK19suvasavu:1330: tatra samarasambhāre kaścid āśaṅkitorubhaṅgaḥ suyodhana iva yodhaḥ payasi viveśa |
GK19suvasavu:1331: kaścic charatalpaśayo bhīṣma iva cirāya śvasann āsīt |
GK19suvasavu:1332: kaścit karṇa iva viklavībhūtasarvāṅgaḥ śaktimokṣaṇam akarot |
GK19suvasavu:1333: tato vidhvastadhvajapaṭaṃ patatpatākaṃ cyutacāpacāmarāpīḍaṃ skhalatkhaḍgadhenukaṃ tatsamastasainyam anyonyaṃ nidhanam avāpa |
GK19suvasavu:1335: anantaraṃ yasyāśramas tena muninā puṣpādikam ādāyāgatena pratipannasarvavṛttāntena “mamāyam āśramo bhagna iti śilāmayī bhaveti” śaptāham |
GK19suvasavu:1336: anantaraṃ “varākī bahuduḥkham anubhavatīti” karuṇayāryaputrasya sparśāvadhi śāpāntam akarot |“
GK19suvasavu:1338: tataḥ Kandarpaketuḥ samāgatena Makarandena Vāsavadattayā saha svapuraṃ gatvā hṛdayābhilaṣitāni tāni tāni suratasukhāny anubhavan kālaṃ nināya ||
GK19suvasavu:1339: iti mahākavi-Subandhu-viracitā Vāsavadattā nāma kathā samāptā |
